name: Firefox Dev Compact
description: Compact Tabs and scrollbars for Firefox Dev Edition / DevEdition theme (can be enabled in FF Stable using about:config - browser.devedition.theme.enabled=true); also fixes some glitches for the 'Vertical Toolbar' add-on
obsoletion_message: deleted - use about:config browser.devedition.theme.enabled=true firefox-dev-compact instead
additional_info:
Scrollbars from https://userstyles.org/styles/105628, standard colors, width changed to 10px

V2: fixed some small differences specific to Linux / Windows, fixed 'Vertical Toolbar' on Windows
V3: purple active tab in private mode, removed native Windows background of 'Vertical Toolbar' (FF Stable + dev theme)
V4: fixed Win fullscreen / windowed mode, fixed bookmarks button on Linux, private mode purple highlighted and 'Vertical Toolbar' hidden

discussions.name: Colored bar on top of the browser in Windows 10
